title: Sampling Distribution of a Sample Mean: Roll That Dice
question_text: The roll of a six-sided die has a uniform distribution with a mean outcome of $3.5$ and a standard deviation of approximately $1.708$ . Which of the following best describes the sampling distribution of the sample means when the same dice is rolled $48$ times?

choices.text: Uniform with a μ ¯ ¯ ¯ x = 3.5 μ x ¯ = 3.5 and a σ ¯ ¯ ¯ x = 1.708 σ x ¯ = 1.708
